name: Galaxy Clicker апп
description:
Battle for Galaxy has began! Prepare your fleet for the devastating strike to proof you dominating!

"Having played pretty much every click game in the store I can say this is the best. Most options, length, play value, strategic options, graphics. Bravo dev. Thank you."

► Unstoppable space battle!

► Incredible choice of battleships and planets to conquer!

► Wide system of craft and technology research!

► Unusual mix of clicker, slicer and tower defense!

► Chat with other players!

► No in-app purchases! Minimum AD!

If you would like to support developer - buy Premium version of Galaxy Clicker:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gm_shaber.GalaxyClickerPremium

Music by Matthew Pablo, ships by MillionthVector! Thank you!
Inspired by cookies :)
